backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing logo rendering, fallback branding, and layout requirements with associated files and metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of key frontend files including layout, pages, config, hooks, and components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH-driven light/dark theme tokens and global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with routes for main pages inside SiteLayout.
Logo component that displays an image with automatic fallback text if loading fails.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Footer with branding, navigation links, contact details, and attribution.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Responsive header with logo, desktop navigation, and mobile drawer menu.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Page wrapper rendering header, routed content, and footer.
frontend/src/constants/contact.ts: Centralized contact info object shared across the site.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages backend actor instances based on Internet Identity state with React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context and logic using AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder for future backend-related React Query hooks.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and CSS variables for light/dark themes with fintech color palette and global styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, setting up React Query and Internet Identity provider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Implements a contact form with validation, mailto submission, clipboard fallback, and info cards.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Creates the homepage with hero banner, feature highlights, and services overview sections.
frontend/src/pages/ProductPage.tsx: Displays product details, benefits, and hero section for an AI-driven reconciliation platform.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Shows consulting service offerings with a grid of service cards and descriptive sections.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, animations, theme extensions, and plugins.
project_state.json: Describes the project's current website state, including branding corrections, deployment issues, and required fixes. Lists existing implemented features and known issues related to assets, naming, and missing codebase.
